dialog: For a more comprehensive understanding, I suggest perusing a historical tome.
Many thanks. I shall visit the wizarding library if I desire to know more.
I must take a brief respite from my studies. I have been cooped up within these walls for too long.
Understood. Please do return in two hours' time.
Good day. I seek an audience with Tom Smith.
I'm afraid he is unavailable at his desk at the moment.
Do you have a notion of when he will return?
Tom is away on a wizarding business journey and shall not return until sometime next week.
Is there a means by which I may contact him?
The best way to reach him would be through his wand. Let me give you his number.
Thank you. Might I also inquire about his owl post address, just in case?
Of course. His wand number is 09112223 33, and his owl post address is t.smith@ccw.com.tw.
Thank you so kindly. Does he regularly check his correspondence?
Indeed, he is quite prompt in responding to his messages.
Splendid. Thank you once again for your assistance. You have been most helpful.
It was my pleasure. I hope you are able to reach him.
Pray tell, what seems to be the matter, Mr. Brown?
I am not well, Dr. Ford. I am in a sorry state.
Oh, in what way do you feel unwell?
I have lost my appetite, feel constantly uneasy, and cannot sleep properly.
